title: Paginations
behaviorsList: Pagination can be used in tables, list views, and wizard-type (progressive) forms, as well as tile view or card views.
Only one pagination control is available in the relevant container.
Pagination should not contain any disabled status.
Pagination will only appear if there are at least 10 items; otherwise, it will be hidden.
The default pagination items per page is 25, but this can be customized as needed.
Errors on a page will be indicated by a red dot on the page number.
The page or table content should not reload upon clicking the page number.
The default position is the top right corner, or in OXD list view, it will be at the bottom right corner of the card.
